title: Divine meditations and holy contemplations. By that reverende divine R. Sibbes D.D. Master of Catherine Hall in Cambridge, and sometimes preacher of Grayes Inne in London
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes for Iohn Crooke and Richard Sergier and are to be sold at the signe of the Gray-hound in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Preface "To the Reader" signed: E.C., i.e., Ezekiel Culverwell.
The two pages between pages 271 and 272 are numbered 254 and 259.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
